=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: TELETIES - Spiral Hair Coils - Ponytail Holder Hair Ties for Women - Phone Cord Hair Ties - Strong Grip, No Rip, Water Resistant, No Crease Hair Tie Coils - 3 pack (Large, Maliblu)
Review Date: 2020/07/23
Store: Teleties
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Fabric', 'Item Form': 'Spiral', 'Brand': 'Teleties', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Number of Pieces': '3', 'Package Dimensions': '3 x 3 x 1.2 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'UPC': '711841892807'}
Review Text: I love telephone cord style hair ties. They gather all of my hair into a ponytail or bun easily and, best of all, they don't give me headaches like more traditional hair elastics. These are a pretty combination of aqua blue and white, and they are very sturdy.
Review Title: No Headaches
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
AuroTrends Makeup Remover Towel,2 Pack Reusable Chemical-free Microfiber Makeup Remover Cloths,Magically and Gently Wipe Away Cosmetics,Sunscreen,Oil and Dirt,Set of 2 (Pink+Black)
AuroTrends
{'Brand': 'AuroTrends', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Material Feature': 'Reusable', 'Unit Count': '2.0 Count', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.52 x 2.72 x 1.42 inches; 6.4 Ounces'}
These are really soft. Also, even when they are soaking wet, they don't feel drippy. I am weird about having water on/in my face, and these cloths allow me to wash my face without triggering an odd anxious feeling. I really like these cloths and always keep one on hand.
Really Soft

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** Values reusable, chemical-free skincare solutions and seeks comfortable hair accessories that focus on functionality.
- **Material Preference:** Prefers soft, high-quality materials that enhance comfort and usability, now notably including fabric-based solutions.
- **Skin Sensitivity:** Sensitive to water on the face; seeks products that minimize discomfort or anxiety during use, consistent across skincare and hairstyling choices.
- **Functionality:** Prioritizes practicality and effectiveness in daily routines, appreciating tools that provide strong support without causing discomfort, such as headache-free hair ties.
- **Consistency in Purchasing:** Likely to repeatedly purchase items that align with comfort and practicality needs, demonstrating a preference for items that enhance daily life while maintaining personal values.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Tends to have a positive outlook toward products that align with personal values and comfort, leading to high ratings for desirable attributes. Demonstrated satisfaction with functional, aesthetically pleasing items shows an inclination towards products that balance style and ease of use.

This updated summary reflects the user's strong inclination towards comfort, practicality, and sensitivity in both skincare and hairstyling choices, emphasizing consistent behaviors and preferences across various product categories.
